name: Lawrence
description:
This small game, or digital comic, is a distillation of the final weeks spent with my dad. My father, Lawrence, passed away from complications of ALS on March 20, 2015. My brother and I had been staying with him for several months -- caring for him, and also just hanging out. After he was gone I started making these doodles, and the doodles eventually became this piece.

Thank you for playing~

stephen
